channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-3870] Purge copyrights from src headers
item.description:
Henry Yandell wrote me:

A quick note that I noticed that there were copyright statements in the HBase code.

For example:

http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/hbase/trunk/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/ClusterStatus.java

My understanding from http://www.apache.org/legal/src-headers.html is
that they shouldn't be there.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: We're doing this as we go, right?
We are. Should probably just run a one-type purge and then close this issue for good. Let me do it....

I used this bit of prettyness:


$ perl -i -nle 'print unless /.*Copyright .* The Apache Software Foundation.*/' `find ./ -name "*.java" -o -name "*.jamon" -o -name "*.rb" -o -name "*.c" -o -name "*.py" -o -name "*.proto" -o -name "*.html" -o -name "*.xml"`

It looks like it works. Let me run it by hadoopqa

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12543794/cp.txt
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 759 new or modified tests.

+1 hadoop2.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 2.0 profile.

-1 javadoc. The javadoc tool appears to have generated 110 warning messages.

-1 javac. The applied patch generated 5 javac compiler warnings (more than the trunk's current 4 warnings).

-1 findbugs. The patch appears to introduce 7 new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/2785//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/2785//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-hadoop2-compat.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/2785//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-hadoop1-compat.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/2785//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-common.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/2785//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-server.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/2785//artifact/trunk/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-hadoop-compat.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/2785//console

This message is automatically generated.
Nice

Integrated in HBase-TRUNK #3303 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/3303/)
HBASE-3870 Purge copyrights from src headers (Revision 1380965)

Result = SUCCESS
